Uses of Interface
xxl.core.cursors.visual.Controllable

  • Packages that use Controllable 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.cursors.visual
    The package xxl.core.cursors.visual contains a simple framework for providing visual panels that can be used to control input iterations.

    • Uses of Controllable in xxl.core.cursors.visual

      Classes in xxl.core.cursors.visual that implement Controllable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IteratorControllable
      A controllable iterator wraps an iterator in order to enhance it by the possibility to be controlled remotely.
      Fields in xxl.core.cursors.visual declared as Controllable 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Controllable ControllerJPanel.controllable
      The controllable object that should be remotely controlled by this visual controller panel.
      Constructors in xxl.core.cursors.visual with parameters of type Controllable 
      Constructor and Description
      ControllerJPanel(Controllable controllable)
      Creates a new visual controller panel controlling the specified controllable object using the given layout manager.
      ControllerJPanel(Controllable controllable, LayoutManager layout, int stepsMin, int stepsMax)
      Creates a new visual controller panel controlling the specified controllable object using the given layout manager.
